attributes.action: Review and update the role and powers of The Speaker in the House of Commons.
attributes.additional_details: Evidence the furore in the House due to the Speaker's decisions on allowing the timings and subjects to be debated since the referendum.
attributes.background: The powers and independence of The Speaker have been brought into question over the past three years and this needs to be reviewed and refined.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly how you'd like to see the role of the Speaker change. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
